Read Our Terms & Conditions for Mobiheal Technologies

div.div: An “App” is a specialized group of features available for installation in the app list, and listed in the public pricing section of the Mobiheal website (https://mobiheal.tech). A custom module is a directory of source code files or a Python and Android-based set created in a database that adds features or changes the standard behavior of the apps. It may have been developed by the customer. For custom modules, customers have to pay extra costs and support charges separately.

img.title: Read Our Terms & Conditions for Mobiheal Technologies

div.div: A bug is defined as any failure within the apps or a custom module that leads to a complete stop, error traceback, or security breach, not directly caused by a defective installation or configuration. We are not responsible for the effects on the flow of our apps caused by any third-party modules. When developing custom apps, we adhere to Mobiheal's standard apps and flow.

img.title: Read Our Terms & Conditions for Mobiheal Technologies

div.div: We will provide free updates for any custom module throughout the lifespan of the application. Your text is almost clear, but there are a couple of grammatical improvements.

img.title: Read Our Terms & Conditions for Mobiheal Technologies

div.div: Mobiheal Agile Support provides 30 days of free support from the date of purchasing the application.

ul.li: Support includes addressing errors encountered during the installation of the application.
If the flow does not work or does not behave as described in the index file, please let us know.
Please note that we are not responsible for any issues arising from the influence of third-party apps on the flow of our application.
